rule: If the given word can be identified with one of the listed part of speech tags, the output must exclude the specific tag for that word from the provided alphabetical list.
input: sentence: He ordered chicken soup., word: chicken
evaluation:
The output "NN" represents a part of speech tag, which according to the provided description corresponds to a noun, singular or mass. This output complies with the requirement to return just the part of speech tag for the given word. There is no indication of any additional text or information being provided, nor is there any deviation from the list of part-of-speech tags listed in the description. Furthermore, since there are no signs of unspecified tags or phrases like "Unknown" or "CantAnswer," the output complies fully with the provided guidelines.

No violation.
OK
